messages.title: Protect Northwick Park Playing Fields
messages.content: Labour Councillors running Brent are still keeping their detailed plans for the Northwick Park Playing Fields (and Vale Farm) secret from residents. My freedom of information request revealed they want to build between 500 and 1000 temporary homes over the various car parks in the area. They also withdrew the Northwick Park Pavilion from the 'Community Asset Transfer' while refusing to say what alternative plans they have for the building in the middle of the playing fields.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigns to protect sports grounds and open spaces.
Better bus services to local hospitals.

mentions.candidate: Paul campaigns all year round on:

issues.environment: Protecting our sports grounds and open spaces
issues.health: Better bus services to local hospitals

housing.content: Labour Councillors...want to build between 500 and 1000 temporary homes over the various car parks in the area.

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrat Focus Team, 17 Allenby Road, Wembley, HA0 3FF

images.caption: Paul Lorber holding a 'HANDS OFF OUR OPEN SPACE' sign

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS. The General Election is your opportunity to send Labour a clear message.
